programmes.show_description: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
7/8. Celestine and her mouse friends are looking for a place to build a tree house in the forest.
3/15. Tha Sophie agus a caraidean a' bocadaich coltach ri coineanach agus tìgear. Sophie and her friends dance like a rabbit and a tiger.
11/15. Eilidh Cormack meets Callum and his pet dogs Penny and Poppy.
1/52. Tha Meanbh air fonn a chruthachadh 's tha i 'son a' shealltainn do Bheag. Meanbh has created a melody and she wants to show it to Beag.
2/52. Tha Moo Adhair air rudeigin annasach a lorg a' flèodradh ann am fànas. Moo Adhair has found something unusual floating in space.

programmes.show_name: 'S E Iasg a Th'Annam (I'm a Fish)
programmes.show_description: 52/52. Cluinnidh sinn bho Dhràgon Gorm an-diugh. We hear from a Blue Dragon Fish today.
73/82. Derek MacIntosh reads Am Mathan a Bhiodh a' Coimhead, written and illustrated by Duncan Beadie and translated into Gaelic by Morag Stewart.
12/12. Tha Calum a' strì airson soirbheachais aig Cogadh nan Còmhlan. Calum wants to take his band to victory in Oban at the Battle of the Bands.
8/13. Tha Flix 'son  seacaid shònraicht' a cheannach bhon bhùth 'Aon Bhliadhna Deug Gu Sìorraidh'! Flix wants to buy a special jacket from the shop Aon Bhliadhna Deug Gu Sìorraidh!
8/20. Every time the postman pays the Farmer a visit, Bitzer's canine instincts get the better of him, resulting in shredded mail and an irate farmer.
3/3. Ellen introduces some of the surprising characters who have visited the CBBC ALBA studio.
...Gumbalan/Bottersnikes and Gumbles. 38/52. Tha Uilidh ag ionnsachadh mun Ghumbal gun Ainm an-diugh. Uilidh learns about the Un-named Gumbal today.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.
...Airdrieonians v Raith Rovers. Live football as Airdrieonians welcome Raith Rovers to the Excelsior Stadium in the semi-final of the Scottish Challenge Cup.
11/33. Seisean acoustic bhon t-seinneadair electro-pop Fourth Daughter aig Belladrum 2025. An acoustic session from electro-pop artist Fourth Daughter.
2/4. Sketch show featuring an intimate dining experience, an embarrassing confrontation in the shopping aisle, and old friends at war.
2/3. Hitler's establishment of a totalitarian dictatorship after becoming Reich chancellor. Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.
7/12. Tha Abigail ag ullachadh Bircher Muesli, bracaist làn spionnaidh. Abigail prepares a Bircher muesli, perfect for a hearty breakfast.
2/6. Featuring performances from Mary Chapin Carpenter, Aly Bain, Mairéad Ní Mhaonaigh, Fiona Kennedy and Dan Tyminski.

Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.
7/104. Tha Bing 's Sula a' feuchainn ri taigh a thogail airson an losgann a tha iad air a lorg. Bing and Sula attempt to build a house for the frog they've found in the garden.
8/104. Tha Bing mì-thoilichte g' eil Charlie ro bheag airson an geama aige a chluich cuide ris. Bing is frustrated that Charlie is too little to play the game that he has chosen for them.
7/26. With the moon growing thinner and the woods growing darker night by night, Owl begins to feel lonely and starts to dread his duties. Luckily, Hare has a plan!

programmes.show_description: 52/52. Cluinnidh sinn bho Dhràgon Gorm an-diugh. We hear from a Blue Dragon Fish today.
...Adventures of Abney & Teal. 28/52. It is a hot and sunny day on the Island, so Abney and Teal make themselves shady, straw hats.
4/26. For homework, Petit and his friends must draw what they imagine the prehistoric missing link looks like.
74/82. Mairi Morrison reads Cuimhnich a-nis, Na Dèan Mèaran, written by Helene Boudreau, illustrated by Serge Bloch and translated into Gaelic by Donald John Macleod.
7/13. Tha seann teampall falaichte le ìomhaighean annasach, na dhìomhaireas do Na Neachdan. A strange hidden ancient temple with unusual statues is a mystery to the Neachdan today.
2/6. Tha bhìoras coimpiutaireach mu sgaoil ann an Sgoil Taobh na Cloiche. A computer virus is spreading through Sgoil Taobh na Cloiche.
2/2. Ellen NicDhòmhnaill le taghadh de na còig criomagan fiosrachaidh a b' fheàrr a chòrd rithe fhèin. Ellen MacDonald introduces a selection of her favourite facts.
...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 42/52. Dave's lazy day of doing nothing is ruined when the town sees an uprising... of their pants!
8/8. A' spothadh each Przewalski's, lannsaireachd air retriever is beathaichean beag Bharraigh. A Przewalski's horse gets castrated, cats and dogs in Barra and surgery on a retriever.
20/26. Professor Rob Ó Maolalaigh chats to Joy about dialects, and Calum Maclean is in Islay to learn more about the island's distinctive Gaelic.
Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.
4/8. Ramsay MacMahon walks the coastline of south Ayrshire with Niall O'Gallagher. Tha Ramsay MacMahon air chuairt ann an Siorrachd Àir a Deas le Niall O'Gallagher.
3/3. Mar a chur Hitler na h-àrd chomandairean gu cogadh marbhteach. How Hitler committed his top commanders to a war of extermination. Contains graphic violence and disturbing scenes.

2/6. Coinneach MacFhraing pits himself against difficult winter conditions in one of Scotland's fearsome mountain environments.
15/16. Alasdair MacLeod on the challenges facing the Icelandic language. Icelanders point to rising immigration, the increasing prevalence of English and the influence of technology.
